name: biomni-query-synapse
title: Biomni: Query Synapse
description: Query Sage Bionetworks Synapse for collaborative research datasets and computational workflows.
content:
Overview

Searches Synapse platform hosting collaborative biomedical research data including genomics datasets, clinical data, tools, and reproducible workflows with version control and provenance tracking.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query
  • query_term (string, optional): Direct search term
  • return_fields (list, optional): Specific fields
  • max_results (integer, optional): Maximum results
  • query_type (string, optional): Entity type
  • verbose (boolean, optional): Enable logging

Input Format

Create JSON:

{
  "prompt": "Find Alzheimer genomics datasets",
  "max_results": 20
}

Biological Use Case

Important for accessing collaborative datasets and reproducible science. Researchers use Synapse to share and discover datasets, collaborate on analyses, track provenance, run workflows, and access curated disease collections.

Output

Returns JSON (synapse_results.json) with project info, Synapse IDs, descriptions, data types, files, access requirements, versions, publications, and download links.

Category

database
